item.title: Studycrafter
item.description: StudyCrafter is a free playful platform where users can create, play, and share research projects to advance our understanding of human behavior together. It is intended for teaching research and conducting the next generation of social and behavioral science research â€“ and to engage the public at large with scientific research across the world. It takes a playful approach to science: it inspires users to find creative ways to explore human behavior and enables them to create gamified projects to engage their participants.

item.title: XERT
item.description: Our goal in this program is to facilitate the coordinated transformation of the workforce in industry and in the government (both civilian and military sectors) and ensure that the training and capability of skilled personnel in the government sector (both uniformed and civilian) are able to adapt and keep pace with the accelerated rate of change in advanced and additive manufacturing practices.
